nodes.text: The LCQ-4 quad laser cannon was a type of quad laser cannon developed by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc. by the time of the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. LCQ-4 quad laser cannons were considered to be the gold standard of laser cannon design; they fired alternating bolt patterns to deal significantly more damage than standard cannons and yet also maintaining formidable accuracy. The LCQ-4's main flaw was its prodigious power consumption, which Merr-Sonn downplayed in marketing the weapon.
